title: 07/08/21 DPS Hour 2 Michael Lee
itunes:title: 07/08/21 DPS Hour 2 Michael Lee
description:
Jason Smith and Ryan Hollins, in for Dan, react to John Sterling hilariously miscalling a home run and Ryan gives insight on what it's like to do remote play-by-play. The guys discuss the breaking news regarding the Olympics and their continued battle with COVID-19. Longtime NBA writer for the Washington Post Michael Lee joins the guys to discuss the biggest storylines of the NBA Finals. Plus, Giannis or Chris Paul, who is under more pressure to win this title?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
